contents:
Hey, I am Mert. Self-Taught ML Engineer who loves to contribute communities. I love communities because it reminds me that we need to support each other in the success journey, because we have to not be selfish and contribute each other lives.
I’m Community Coordinator at the Iterativecompany which is MLOps company. The mission of company is delivering the best developer experience for machine learning teams by creating an ecosystem of open, modular ML tools.
title: About Me

contents:
I’m starting to write public journals, my learning process and other technical blogs.
I spent most of my time with creating this blog site today. I hate web development, somehow I finished with cool tools like Jekyll. ðŸ’• Still there are some bugs, one of them is footer links are not opening in another tab. I looked every little hole (even blackhole!) but couldn’t find a solution. It’s night here, I still have unfinished tasks but I’m writing my first blog.
title: Introduction

contents: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
title: Emoji Support

contents: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
title: Markdown Syntax Guide

contents: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
title: Math Typesetting

contents: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
title: Rich Content
